data.what_is:
eMarketeer is your all-in-one marketing automation platform! Easy to use yet incredible powerful. 

In our platform you'll find tools for
Marketing automation
Email marketing
Event management
Surveys and evaluations
Landing pages
Mobile apps
Mobile marketing
data.product_description: eMarketeer offers all-in-one online marketing solutions.

pricing_plans.plan_description: A powerful package for getting started with multi-channel marketing.
A highly advanced package that automates across multiple channels.

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the Rockstar in the email marketing space.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eMarketeer?
The ease of usage. I have created set templates for Newsletters - every month, I add/edit the content and then send it to my colleagues.
Pricing: eMarketeer has competitive pricing compared to other tools in the market.
Reporting: eMarketeer has one of the best and easy to use reports. Reports such as marketing activity report, activity report are placed right next to the dashboard option. I would say that was a very nice idea.

What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
Sometimes when you are working on the tool for a long time, the tool gets stuck. But most of the time, it works well. Apart from that, I don't see any other issues with the tool.

What problems is eMarketeer solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use it for Email Marketing and SMS Marketing. We are pleased with the tool; it takes care of all our Email and SMS marketing requirements completely. We will subscribe with the tool in the future too.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about eMarketeer?
review_question_answers.answer:
The ease of usage. I have created set templates for Newsletters - every month, I add/edit the content and then send it to my colleagues.
Pricing: eMarketeer has competitive pricing compared to other tools in the market.
Reporting: eMarketeer has one of the best and easy to use reports. Reports such as marketing activity report, activity report are placed right next to the dashboard option. I would say that was a very nice idea.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
review_question_answers.answer: Sometimes when you are working on the tool for a long time, the tool gets stuck. But most of the time, it works well. Apart from that, I don't see any other issues with the tool.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is eMarketeer solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We use it for Email Marketing and SMS Marketing. We are pleased with the tool; it takes care of all our Email and SMS marketing requirements completely. We will subscribe with the tool in the future too.

initial_reviews.review_title: eMarketeer - Best Marketing Platform To Monitor Business Sales Online
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eMarketeer?
eMarketeer is a complete marketing automation suite that allows us to build promotion landing pages, create email campaigns, run social media advertising and generate leads from our business website.  The platform brings together Marketing Automation, Email Marketing, Mobile Marketing, and Template Sharing in one easy to use solution. It has an advanced drag & drop option that allows us to spend more time on growing our business and less time on building a business marketing strategy.

What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
No issue was faced with eMarketeer.  It's dashboard is easy to manage all marketing channels and provides notifications to improve business marketing.

Recommendations to others considering eMarketeer:
We recommend eMarketeer for business sales monitors to increase business. We can set our email marketing campaign and integrate with google analytics easily.

What problems is eMarketeer solving and how is that benefiting you?
eMarketeer is a perfect solution for our business to sell products online. We can easily manage all of our marketing in an integrated way. It allows us to create & distribute landing pages, email campaigns and much more. Advanced integration with Google Analytics and Google Adwords we can track the effectiveness of our marketing efforts and increase ROI. We can promote our business product using custom emails and other marketing channels to boost business sales. It is very effective for the sales team to manage orders and leads on time. According to our business needs, eMarketeer is a good one for our business.

review_question_answers.answer: eMarketeer is a complete marketing automation suite that allows us to build promotion landing pages, create email campaigns, run social media advertising and generate leads from our business website.  The platform brings together Marketing Automation, Email Marketing, Mobile Marketing, and Template Sharing in one easy to use solution. It has an advanced drag & drop option that allows us to spend more time on growing our business and less time on building a business marketing strategy.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
review_question_answers.answer: No issue was faced with eMarketeer.  It's dashboard is easy to manage all marketing channels and provides notifications to improve business marketing.

review_question_answers.answer: We recommend eMarketeer for business sales monitors to increase business. We can set our email marketing campaign and integrate with google analytics easily.

Advanced integration with Google Analytics and Google Adwords we can track the effectiveness of our marketing efforts and increase ROI. We can promote our business product using custom emails and other marketing channels to boost business sales. It is very effective for the sales team to manage orders and leads on time. According to our business needs, eMarketeer is a good one for our business.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Tool for Marketing & Event management with Web forms !
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eMarketeer?
It's a single tool that can manage events, email marketing, web forms and surveys, Landing pages, etc. Its very good in all modules and supports many other functions. It has brilliant features and provision of various marketing tools and campaigns. Users can create and schedule multiple campaigns, and it helps in shortlisting of leads generation till its maturity. It also supports various channels on the marketplace and consolidates all the leads and prospects on the same platform. It is ready-to-use software and easy to install. No plugin is required. It supports sales and marketing teams.

What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
Mobile marketing is not updated and supports the old features. The data need to be segregated as per the preset format available, which is very tough to Update. The user needs to change the format of the excel and pdf files and then be able to import them into the system. The display of the mobile version needs to be enhanced. Overall, support is provided, and no such big issue is faced.

Recommendations to others considering eMarketeer:
For the single-point resolution of managing the marketing and event to organize, this tool works very well. It provides overall support for the campaign, and all reports can share with the attendees.

What problems is eMarketeer solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have to start the campaign quickly. As such, the marketing team provides the green signal. It helps in the immediate start of the same. We have to design multiple themes, and it will take time. This tool helps in saving time as it has already pre-made Themes and template design. These templates are designed for multiple screen adjustment and work very well in Mobile and cross-platform responsiveness. They also provide Rent the admin concept, which allows users to hire a dedicated team for managing the event and marketing campaign. The hourly rate is excellent and competitive.

It also supports various channels on the marketplace and consolidates all the leads and prospects on the same platform. It is ready-to-use software and easy to install. No plugin is required. It supports sales and marketing teams.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eMarketeer?
*I really liked their user interface and easy onboarding process.
*They offer affordable pricing plans.
*I have used eMarketeer for my clients, and have fulfilled their words.

What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
To be honest, I don't have any complaints about them but if they can extend their services in Digital Marketing Domain, then it would be awesome, like Social Media automation and all.

Recommendations to others considering eMarketeer:
I would like to recommend eMarketeer to everyone, I'm sure it won't disappoint you.

What problems is eMarketeer solving and how is that benefiting you?
I used the app for the marketing needs of my clients.

Easy to use, easy to track progress, great traning videos.

What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
Not anything I don't particularly appreciate after they changed the entire user interface, which brought the UX into the 20th century.

Recommendations to others considering eMarketeer:
Make sure your CRM integrates with eMarketeer, to get full value.

We are now getting relevant flow of information to the potentiel costumers signing our different leadgenerators.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eMarketeer?
The eMarketeer-support is very helpful and the pricing is reasonable.

What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
The system is not designed for enterprise use, the reporting data is inaccurate and the Salesforce-integration is very limited. For enterprise use, with many campaigns, assets and contact card attributes, the system is difficult to navigate, click-heavy and slow.

What problems is eMarketeer solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use the system for email-marketing, event management, and automation.

review_question_answers.answer: We use the system for email-marketing, event management, and automation.

Website monitoring feature is amazing, I use this tool parallelly with Google Analytics to check user behaviour.
While creating newsletter, the images that you add, gets adjusted as per the template, its super co

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eMarketeer?
The eMarketeer-support is very helpful and the pricing is reasonable.

What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
The system is not designed for enterprise use, the reporting data is inaccurate and the Salesforce-integration is very limited. For enterprise use, with many campaigns, assets and contact card attributes, the system is difficult to navigate, click-heavy and slow.

What problems is eMarketeer solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use the system for email-marketing, event management, and automation.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best online marketing automation solution in the market.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about eMarketeer?
Website monitoring feature is amazing, I use this tool parallelly with Google Analytics to check user behaviour.
While creating newsletter, the images that you add, gets adjusted as per the template, its super co

What do you dislike about eMarketeer?
Subscription prices is bit higher.
Overall tool speed could be bit increased, its bit slow especially when you are scheduling the e-mails.

Recommendations to others considering eMarketeer:
A complete marketing automation solution, it consists of almost all the marketing tools integrated in it. Definitely worth a try.

What problems is eMarketeer solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using it for our email marketing and creating newsletters.
